title: Happened in Mumbai. What’s wrong with people?
selftext: She was wearing a sweater that fully covered her chest on her way to work. Random bozos throwing cigarettes at women now in Malad, Mumbai.
comments:
Women’s choice of clothing has got nothing to do with why men act like such disgusting creeps. It’s just about feeling more power over another person.

Women wearing most conservative clothings are just as equally attacked. So OP the fact you needed to mention her clothing is part of the problem blaming the victim.

I wonder if she catched the number or if there are CCTV’s in the area. She should file a compliant. Assholes like these feel empowered to take these up physical harassment and eventually assaults if they are let go.

> the fact needed to mention her clothing

This happened to my girlfriend and she explicitly said to mention this part because she has been harassed for wearing liberal clothes in public during summer. It’s to highlight that she wasn’t even trying to be noticeable in public for men to target her.
